content: And for the first half of fiscal 2023, we had a net loss of 900,000 or $0.07 per diluted share, compared to a net loss of 1.9 million or $0.14 per diluted share in the prior year first half. EBITDA of $6.4 million for the quarter was greatly improved from a slight loss in the prior year second quarter, and for the year-to-date, EBITDA of 6.3 million is 22% improved from the prior year first half of $5.2 million.
